sources.title: The Boss (1956)
sources.description: The Boss is a 1956 American crime film noir directed by Byron Haskin and starring John Payne. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-boss-1956/

sources.title: The Boss (1956)
sources.description: Political c orruption is vividly depicted as a ruthless WWI veteran takes almost complete control of a state with the help of a crooked lawyer.

metadata.Plot: Political corruption is vividly depicted as a ruthless WWI veteran takes almost complete control of a state with the help of a crooked lawyer. The film is enhanced by John Payne's persuasive performance as "The Boss."
metadata.Actors: John Payne, William Bishop, Gloria McGehee
